fortnite.name: Fortnite
fortnite.description: Fortnite is a third-person shooter game where up to 100 players compete to be the last person or team standing. You can compete alone or join a team of up to four. You progress through the game by exploring the island, collecting weapons, building fortifications and engaging in combat with other players.

call_of_dutty.name: Call Of Dutty
call_of_dutty.description: Mobile’s battle royale mode is another great choice for a game to try. Widely considered the two best survival shooters on mobile (until Fortnite got taken off), Call of Duty and Fortnite are often compared for their graphics, gameplay, and visuals.

Pubg.name: PUBG
Pubg.description: PUBG is a lot more serious in aesthetics, mimicking actual life rather than a more cartoony vibe, but the mission is the same, to be the last man (or duo, or team) standing.

ApexLegends.name: Apex Legends
ApexLegends.description: The love of battle royale continues with Apex Legends from the developer, Respawn Entertainment. They’re quite different games, with Apex Legends giving players unique abilities depending on their character choice, no building, it’s FPS, and you can level up the skills on weaponry.

OverWatch.name: OverWatch
OverWatch.description: Every match is 6v6, so we’re talking a lot smaller of a playing field, but we’re not talking about less action. You pick your hero with unique abilities and then play into the strengths of your role. Plus, it’s free-to-play so what have you got to lose?

Minecraft.name: Minecraft
Minecraft.description: Minecraft is a sandbox game that lets players build and explore a blocky, procedurally generated 3D world. Players can gather resources, craft tools, and survive against various mobs in survival mode or let their creativity run wild in creative mode.

TheWitcher3.name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
TheWitcher3.description: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt is an action RPG with an open world. Play as Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter, and explore a richly detailed world filled with intriguing quests, unforgettable characters, and intense combat.

RocketLeague.name: Rocket League
RocketLeague.description: Rocket League combines soccer with rocket-powered cars in an addictive multiplayer game. Players can compete in different modes, customizing their vehicles and pulling off incredible stunts to score goals.
